definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: But that is the effect of relative dollar depreciation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这却是美元相对贬值的实际结果。

sentences.english: This scenery is not very beautiful, but a picture of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 这景色不见得很美，却是一幅秋日风情画。

sentences.english: But for property buyers are concerned, it is common snipe mussels competing and profit.
sentences.chinese: 但对于购房者来讲，却是鹬蚌相争，渔翁得利。

sentences.english: Invasive molar pregnancy is extremely rare, but is one of te pre-cancer stage for choriocarcinoma .
sentences.chinese: 侵袭性葡萄胎非常罕见，但却是绒癌的一种癌前病变。

sentences.english: Cyndi continued to play local clubs, but this time as a solo artist.
sentences.chinese: 她又继续游走于小型娱乐场所，这次却是她一个人。

sentences.english: But through her cheek is warm tears.
sentences.chinese: 但是流过她脸颊的泪却是温馨的。

sentences.english: Mary teaches religion. However, she is an atheist. She has an excellent sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽教宗教，但她自己却是个无神论者。

sentences.english: Oops. They were one of the best-performing sectors in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 但银行股却是2012年表现最佳的板块之一。

sentences.english: But his eyes were also bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 眼中却是一片鲜血淋漓。

sentences.english: I thought it was my brother. But instead, it was two police officers.
sentences.chinese: 我原以为会是我的哥哥，但取而代之地却是两个警察。

sentences.english: The alternative, though cleaner, is leadership by wimps.
sentences.chinese: 而另一种选择，虽然干净，但却是被无能者领导。

sentences.english: I asked your disciples to drive out the spirit, but they could not.
sentences.chinese: 我请过你的门徒把鬼赶出去，他们却是不能。

sentences.english: Instead, the fisherman drew out a copper jar.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫取出来的却是一个铜罐。

sentences.english: One thing is certain, which is, that generally after conquerors follow thieves.
sentences.chinese: 有一点却是确实的，就是常有小偷跟在胜利者后面。

sentences.english: But for Eikhenbaum, there's obviously a lot at stake.
sentences.chinese: 但是对艾肯鲍姆却是生死攸关的。

sentences.english: Even with perfect viewing conditions, the lights are notoriously hit or miss.
sentences.chinese: 尽管天气条件很好，北极光却是来无影去无踪。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
